snippet: The Detroit Pistons rookie Andre Drummond is expected to miss four to six weeks because of a stress fracture in his back.
abstract: Detroit Pistons center Andre Drummond will miss four to six weeks because of stress fracture in his back.
lead_paragraph: The Detroit Pistons rookie Andre Drummond is expected to miss four to six weeks because of a stress fracture in his back.

headline.seo: Pistons’ Andre Drummond Out Four to Six Weeks
headline.main: Pistons’ Drummond Out Four to Six Weeks
